summary: A Keras layer that reshapes any input tensor into a two‑dimensional tensor of shape (batch, features), preserving the batch dimension. It respects the specified data format (channels_last or channels_first) and adds a singleton channel dimension when the input lacks a feature axis.
business_intent: Enables conversion of multi‑dimensional feature maps or sequences into flat vectors so they can be fed into dense layers or other operations that require a 2‑D input, simplifying model construction.
